extracted_entities.name: Assistant Professor Position at the University of Coimbra

details.call_for_proposals: international call for applications for one tenure-track position at the level of Assistant Professor in the field of Informatics Engineering

organizers: Department of Informatics Engineering, University of Coimbra
submission_information: Applications are open until August 7, 2025. More details and the official application portal can be found here: https://apply.uc.pt/IT136-25-15300
